name: Komeiji Google
description:
Saw a friend use styles on their webpage one day.
Decided I wanted my own, too.
Satori and Koishi Komeiji, dark-ish, grey-ish, blue-ish Google theme.
First time using CSS and making a style; there will most likely be bugs. However I tried fixing as much as I can. Not everything is dark. Requests to darken something can be made. Do not hesitate to criticize!
additional_info:
02/08/19 , version 0.1 , created the style.
~~
02/08/19 , version 0.1.2 , fixed a few bugs, uploaded to userstyles.org
~~
later bug fixes and edits may be released
